name: Kayak Vancouver
description: Kayak Vancouver offers guided tours that suit everyones time frame, whether you are looking to go for a few hours our for the whole day. Guided tours are a great way to explore the Vancouver waters, whether it is your first time kayaking or your hundredth. Even if you have lived in Vancouver all your life Kayak Vancouver guarantees you will be amazed with the view from the water, it is a side of Vancouver you have never seen before.
